title: Houston, We Have A Problem
description: Extremely attracted to his adorable and clumsy resident Josie Adkins, Dr. Houston Hayes, who usually refuses to mix business with pleasure, offers Josie one night of passion to once and for all put an end to the sexual tension between them, which backfires in the most hilarious and sensual way. Original. 35,000 first printing.
author: Erin McCarthy
